name: Polygon 2032
description: This is the next Generation Zombie FPS. Sometime this year I will Release it on STEAM. So look out for it. The Story is that you are a soldier in the year 2032 when the Red Star Alliance(made up of Russia and China) have taken over most of the world and have almost taken the United States. You and the remnants of the U.S. Army fight to gain control of you territory. Little do you know there is another enemy you will soon face.
